FAQ.title: Frequent Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Clear your doubts about how to publish on Ludus

approval_time.question: How long does it take for my game to be approved?
approval_time.answer: Our review process takes an average of 24 to 48 business hours. We check technical aspects, content, and overall quality. You will receive detailed feedback if there is anything to adjust.

platform_exclusivity.question: Can I publish my game on other platforms as well?
platform_exclusivity.answer: Yes! We do not require exclusivity. You are free to publish your game wherever you want. We only recommend that you keep your games updated on all platforms.

acceptable_games.question: What kind of games are accepted on Ludus?
acceptable_games.answer: We accept indie games of various genres, according to our terms of publication, as long as they are developed by Brazilians or contain Brazilian cultural elements. We prioritize quality, originality, and gameplay.

cnpj_requirement.question: Do I need a CNPJ (corporate tax ID) to sell games?
cnpj_requirement.answer: Not necessarily. For individual developers, we accept CPF (individual tax ID). However, for higher amounts, we recommend having MEI or CNPJ due to tax issues.

marketing_help.question: Do you help with marketing and promotion?
marketing_help.answer: Yes! All games receive basic promotion on our social media channels. Games of exceptional quality may be featured on the homepage and at special events.

update_publishing.question: Can I update my game after it's published?
update_publishing.answer: Yes! You can make as many updates as you want, at no additional cost. Just upload the new version through the developer panel. We only remind you that every post, even updates, goes through our security team.
